channel.title: purrr on Algoritma Technical Blog
channel.description: Recent content in purrr on Algoritma Technical Blog

item.title: Purrr-operly Fitting Multiple Time Series Model
item.description: In this article, I will explain some basic functional programming for fitting multiple time series using R, particularly using purrr interface. TL;DR: you can find the distraction-free script in here, and read some of my concluding remarks for a quick summary :grin: Preface When it comes to time series analyses and forecasting, R users are blessed with an invaluable tools that could helps us to conveniently fit–from basic to advanced–univariate time series models: forecast package.
